ValidationRule.description: If the customer email is already filled, user can't change that. SCC - 164
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( NOT(ISBLANK(PRIORVALUE(Customer_Email__c))), ISPICKVAL(Type, "Customer") , ISCHANGED(Customer_Email__c ), OR(INCLUDES(Platform__c, "Talabat"), INCLUDES(Platform__c, "Carriage"), INCLUDES(Platform__c, "Otlob")), NOT($Permission.Exclude_from_Validation) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot change the Customer Email.
